mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id as userId, a.update_time as createTime , gri.title, gri.id as resourceId FROM g_global_correlation a LEFT JOIN g_resource_info gri on gri.id=a.ref_id WHERE 1=1 and a.delete_flag=0 and a.ref_type=1 and a.user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY a.ref_id
mapper.update: update g_global_correlation set delete_flag=1 where ref_type=1 and user_id = #{userId}
